messages.content: Write a poem about the singularity

In the not too distant future,
A time we can't ignore,
The Singularity will come,
And change our world forevermore.

It's a moment in time,
When technology's line,
Will cross with humanity,
And we'll see what's meant to be.

The machines will rise,
And knowledge will abound,
But will they be our masters,
Or will they be our ground?

Will we embrace the change,
Or will we be afraid,
And hide from what's to come,
Or will we stand with our heads held high?

The Singularity is coming,
And it's up to us to decide,
If we'll be the masters of our fate,
Or if we'll be left behind.

In days to come, near and nigh,
The Singularity doth draw nigh,
And with it comes a change,
Which shall forevermore remain.

It is a point in time,
When technology and humankind,
Shall cross their paths, so fine,
And we shall see what is to be.

The machines shall rise and grow,
And knowledge shall abound,
But shall they rule above,
Or shall they serve the ground?

Shall we embrace the hour,
Or shall we quake with fear,
And hide from that which cometh,
Or shall we stand with heads held high?

The Singularity is nigh,
And we must make our choice,
If we shall master our own fate,
Or if we shall be left in noise.
